dcterms:creator: Y. Li
A. S. Trigell
X. Jin
Z. Brock
Z. Ziaukas
J.-P. Kobler
A. Busch
T. Ortmaier
M. Wielitzka
dcterms:description: The dataset includes measurements of lateral and vertical tire forces of a semitrailer, which are crucial for understanding vehicle dynamics and developing assistance systems.
dcterms:title: Lateral and Vertical Tire Forces of the Semitrailer

dcterms:creator: A. S. Trigell
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the advanced vehicle dynamics of heavy trucks, focusing on safety aspects and performance metrics.
dcterms:title: Advanced Vehicle Dynamics of Heavy Trucks

dcterms:creator: X. Jin
G. Yin
N. Chen
dcterms:description: A survey of advanced estimation techniques for vehicle system dynamic states, providing methodologies for state estimation in vehicle dynamics.
dcterms:title: Advanced Estimation Techniques for Vehicle System Dynamic State

dcterms:creator: Z. Brock
J. Nelson
R. L. Hatton
dcterms:description: This dataset compares various lateral dynamic models for tractor-trailer systems, focusing on their performance and applicability.
dcterms:title: Comparison of Lateral Dynamic Models for Tractor-Trailer Systems

dcterms:creator: Z. Ziaukas
J.-P. Kobler
A. Busch
M. Wielitzka
T. Ortmaier
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a nonlinear modeling approach for truck-semitrailer lateral dynamics, validated through experimental data on lateral tire forces.
dcterms:title: Nonlinear Modeling of Truck-Semitrailer Lateral Dynamics

dcterms:creator: T. Ghandriz
B. Jacobson
P. Nilsson
L. Laine
N. Fröjd
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on computationally efficient nonlinear models for multitrailer road vehicles, providing insights into their dynamics.
dcterms:title: Computationally Efficient Nonlinear One- and Two-Track Models for Multitrailer Road Vehicles

dcterms:creator: M. Gäfvert
O. Lindgärde
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a 9-DOF dynamic handling model for tractor-semitrailer systems, aimed at advanced chassis control studies.
dcterms:title: A 9-DOF Tractor-Semitrailer Dynamic Handling Model

dcterms:creator: H. B. Pacejka
dcterms:description: This dataset provides comprehensive insights into tire and vehicle dynamics, serving as a foundational reference for vehicle dynamics studies.
dcterms:title: Tire and Vehicle Dynamics

dcterms:creator: D. Schramm
M. Hiller
R. Bardini
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on modeling and simulation of vehicle dynamics, providing methodologies for dynamic analysis.
dcterms:title: Modeling and Simulation of Vehicle Dynamics

dcterms:creator: J. Kennedy
R. Eberhart
dcterms:description: This dataset presents the principles of particle swarm optimization, a method used for optimization tasks in various fields including vehicle dynamics.
dcterms:title: Particle Swarm Optimization

dcterms:creator: J. Nocedal
S. Wright
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into numerical optimization techniques, essential for various applications including vehicle dynamics.
dcterms:title: Numerical Optimization
